name: Ext_R3_MessageHeader_event
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.MessageHeader.event for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents MessageHeader.event from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MessageHeader|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Code for the event this message represents
element.definition: Code that identifies the event this message represents and connects it with its definition. Events defined as part of the FHIR specification have the system value "http://hl7.org/fhir/message-events".
element.comment: `MessageHeader.event[x]` maps to R5 `MessageHeader.event[x]`. Target added uri:canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EventDefinition) target profiles: http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EventDefinition So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Code for the event this message represents
element.definition: Code that identifies the event this message represents and connects it with its definition. Events defined as part of the FHIR specification have the system value "http://hl7.org/fhir/message-events".
element.comment: `MessageHeader.event[x]` maps to R5 `MessageHeader.event[x]`. Target added uri:canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EventDefinition) target profiles: http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EventDefinition So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: One of the message events defined as part of FHIR.
